input.sentences: the window view hints at the glorious times that await them .
the waves are picking up as the anticipation is building .
finally a better glimpse of the old civilization brings relief .
they have arrived and begin the exploration .
the sun sets over a day well spent .
output.sentences: We travelled to our holiday destination on a boat.
We looked out the window at the sea as we travelled.
We finally saw land and were very excited to arrive.
We began exploring the local sites.
The evening came and we sat by the sea and enjoyed the beautiful scenery as the sun set on the first night of our trip.
